more_content:
New York is newer than ever. Its new neighborhood, Hudson Yards, has the entire city buzzing. Why? For many reasons. It houses some impressive architectural feats, offers breathtaking views and is a cultural hub. Do you want to know more? Then, continue reading! 

Hudson Yards is located between 10th and 12th Avenues from West 30th to West 34th Street, on Manhattan’s West Side. This area has been experiencing a renaissance for decades. We all know the story of how The High Line and Chelsea Piers were rescued by a few brave souls with vision. Hudson Yards is no different. 

Capture Great Views

The main attraction is the Vessel, an imposing structure rising 100 stories up made up of 154 interconnecting flights of stairs. Every corner offers unique vantage points that make for great photo opportunities. The cherry on the cake is the Edge, a new viewing platform with sweeping views of the New York skyline and Hudson River. In fact, this is the highest man-made outdoor viewing area in the western hemisphere!

Shop 'til You Drop

Hudson Yards is a shopper’s paradise. Have your credit card ready or simply go window shopping at the hundreds of stores selling everything from clothing to jewelry and electronics. Get all your New York shopping done in one place.

Walk around Art Galleries and “Smart” Public Parks

Hudson Yards stretches over 14 acres, but not every inch is covered by metal and concrete. A significant number of areas are public parks and gardens. What makes them so special is that they’re “the smartest parks” in the city. This means that they were designed with sustainability in mind and built using creative technology.

Last but not least, don’t forget to stop by The Shed, a contemporary art gallery featuring art in all forms, shapes and sizes, and across all disciplines. This is also where Hudson Yards meets The High Line!

Hudson Yards is quickly becoming a must-see New York attraction. Did you know that The New Yorker Hotel is just a short walk away? Don’t waste any time and be among the first to see this new neighborhood. Book one of our special hotel offers and save big!
title: Top Things to Do in Hudson Yards
